title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-4.3 - Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-4.3 - Procedures

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the provisions of this regulation, facility-specific procedures shall be
developed on the use of that facility's phone system. This shall include a
listing of individuals approved to call or receive calls from a resident. These
listings will be provided to appropriate staff. (b) Each facility director shall block
800/900 lines and similar services through the telephone company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
